from or relating to the city of Glasgow in Scotland: Steven has a Glaswegian accent.
More examplesFewer examplesHis wife is Glaswegian.He qualfies to play for Scotland through a Glaswegian grandfather.Phillips remained true to his down-to-earth Glaswegian roots. There is a healthy dose of Glaswegian humour to take off the posey edge.Glaswegian clubbers were a bit slow at first to take advantage of the late opening hours, but are now making up for lost time.
